attributes.action: Ensure that all Secondary Schools make it their school policy that all children wear school blazers and ties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that as a parent, my Daughter has been deprived by this Government and our local school that she is not allowed to wear a school blazer and tie.  I feel that wearing the appropriate uniform makes the children feel valued and respected.  The children will also respect their school, its beliefs and their peers alot more than they do now.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
